name: Simple The Game
description:
Brothers Rick, and Jonah receive a strange package at work. Once opened, they find themselves in a weird dark town with a monster. One of the locals tells them In order to escape. They must defeat the monster that lurks around town.  Now the brothers must use whatever they can find in the strange town.  To soup up, and defeat the monster. If they ever want to go back home.

Note: (If you need help the YouTube video is a  walkthrough guide)
